name: Product team retrospective template
description:
Before making plans for the future, it’s important to look back and consider the highs and lows of the past quarter. Taking time to reflect allows teams to celebrate wins and identify changes to make in the months ahead.


The best retrospectives reflect on more than just the project itself. They reflect on all the key components of a project from start to finish—from strategy alignment, decision-making, execution, to team culture. So invite your cross-functional teammates, celebrate each other, and improve how you work together in the future.
